oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 7th Annual Nashville River Stages
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Foo Fighters (Musical group); Styx (Musical group); Strokes (Musical group); Griffin, Patty; Colvin, Shawn; Indigo Girls (Musical group); Robinson, Chris, 1966-; Lang, Jonny; Woodcuts (prints); Microphone;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (red, yellow, and orange on white) announcing the 7th Annual Nashville River Stages featuring the Foo Fighters, Styx, The Strokes, Patty Griffin, Little Feat, George Clinton and Parliament Funkadelic, Fuel, Wyclef Jean, Fountains of Wayne, Stereophonics, Shawn Colvin, G. Love and Special Sauce, Ween, Indigo Girls, Chris Robinson and the New Earth Mud, Jonny Lang, Puddle of Mudd, Trapt, JOJO and his Mojo Mardi Gras band, Josh Rouse, Switchfoot, Drive-by Truckers, Story of the Year, Venus Hum, Graham Colton, Finger Eleven, Blue Merle, mrnorth, Smile Empty Soul, deSol, Ollabelle, Silvertide, Endochine, Geronimo, Old Union, Foggy Bottom, Gary Jules, Lucky Black, Ligion, Kim's Fable, Bombshell Crush, and Someday Tour in Downtown Nashville from April 30 to May 2. Poster features a woodcut of a microphone.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Edan Bryant;
